highly accomplished AWS Solutions Architect Senior Database Administrator and technology enthusiast with over 16 years of IT experience that includes cloud services design database management development replication automation monitoring performance tuning and high availability Exceptional and proven skills in cloud architecture design database administration and experience in cloud
